titles.title: No Not Despairingly Come I To Thee (easy nice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No not despairingly Come I to Thee No not distrustingly Bend I the kneee Sin hath gone over me Yet is this still my plea Yet is this still my plea Jesus hath died{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ah mine iniquity Crimson hath been Infinite infinite Sin upon sin Sin of not loveing Thee Sin of not trusting Thee Sin of not trusting Thee Infinite sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I confess to Thee Sadly my sin All I am tell I Thee All I have been Purge Thou my sin away Wash Thou my soul this day Wash Thou my soul this day Lord make me clean{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faithful and just art Thou Forgiving all Loving and kind art Thou When sinners call Lord let the cleansing blood Blood of the Lamb of God Blood of the Lamb of God Pass o'er my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then all is peace and light This soul within Thus shall I walk with Thee The loved Unseen Leaning on Thee my God Guided along the road Guided along the road Nothing between{/lang-eng}
